title: Does spending one dirham in charity in Laylatul Qadr multiply the reward | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Mubarak says it does spending wonder ham in charity in lailatul other the night of decree equals does it equal to spending 30 thousand dirhams in other months because 1 times 30 times 1000 no this is totally baseless has no relationship to the multiple the multiplication in lailatul Qatar is not true it is better than a thousand months but it doesn't mean that if I spend 1 rial it will be times 30 a 1000 months if I pray 2 rakat it like some people circulate this broadcast and claim that share Maharal maniacally meglio but harem stated this is totally baseless
